Caption: Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) gives prizes to Mr. Anand Singh Bawa and Mr. Surjit S. Randhava
Description: The Chief Guest, Dr. P. Subbarayan (Union Minister of Transport and Communication) distributed a number of prizes to students and faculty members at the Third Institute Day. The Institute Day of IIT Madras is a day marked to celebrate the hard work and success of certain people who have shown excellence in academics as well as extracurricular activities. In the image, Dr. Mr. Anand Singh Bawa (founding editor of Campastimes, an IIT studentsâ€™ publication) and Mr. Surjit S Randhava (Student Representative). Also seen in the image, in between the chief guest and prize winners is  Mr. Srinivasan (PTI). Identification by Mr. K. Narayanan, Mr. C. V. Sahasranamam and Mr. Anand Singh Bawa.
